posts.title: Duncansville Martins - missed connections
posts.body: We spoke today in the Grocery store. You are bald with a dark beard. You were very nice and I find you attractive. If your interested , please let me know what isle we were in when we talked. Id be happy to take you out for dinner and get to know you better.

posts.title: On the steps of Boro Hall... - missed connections
posts.body: ..right there we talked of many things:  your growing up, that guy who dumped you, the struggle at college.  I offered help.Are you out there?Peter
